---
filters:
  - links.lua
format:
  html:
    toc: false
  pdf:
    toc: false
    documentclass: article
    hyperref:
      - pdfborder={0 0 0}
      - breaklinks=false
      - colorlinks=true
      - urlcolor=blue
    include-before-body:
      # NOTE: It may be possible to style links using another means.
      # NOTE: It is such a pain to remove the ugly rules around tables: https://github.com/jgm/pandoc/issues/8223
      - text: |
          \newcommand{\hreful}[2]{
              \href{#1}{
                  \textcolor{blue}{\ttfamily\underline{#2}}
              }
          }
          \renewcommand{\toprule}[2]{}
          \renewcommand{\bottomrule}[2]{}
    geometry:
      - margin=1in
    keep-tex: true
    template-partials:
      - ./title.tex
format-links:
  - text: tex
    href: ./test.tex
---
